isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Trailer Connection

svcproc.title: Trailer Connection
svcproc.para: The 7-way trailer socket (112) connects the tractor and trailer wiring for operation of stop, tail, turn and hazard signal lights, and tail and clearance lights. Additionally, the trailer socket includes a circuit that provides voltage from the (B1) battery stud to power the trailer antilock brake system. The trailer socket terminals are color coded as shown in Trailer Socket Figure.
